message:
You have asked for help.
Here are some suggestions:
You can interact with items, by typing grab [item] or look [item].
You can move from location to another location by typing go direction.
Examples: go north or use rope.

Welcome to Potion Quest.
Potion Quest is a text-based RPG game.
This game will allow you to go on an adventure to get the potion to cure your sister!
During the quest you will be faced with many choices and obstacles.
Choose wisely ........
Your life and your sister's life DEPENDS on it!
Complete the quest by traveling to the next village over
and bringing back the potion to cure your sister's illness.
Your game will end if your health goes to 0 or you do not complete the quest in 7 minutes.

 To mute and unmute the music, type mute.
Would you like to start the Potion Quest? Enter '[y]es' or '[n]o'

You just finished talking to the village doctor.
Your sister is deathly ill.
It is not be safe to enter the house.
The doctor says that you need to get a potion from the next village over.
 
You see a trinket. You might want to take these items on your journey.
To take the items type get [item].
 
You see 2 paths one to the North and one to the South. 
To travel on a path type go [direction]
 
Pick a path and start your adventure.
 
Hurry, your sister is running out of time!
